name: One Day At School
description:
A story mode game, "One Day At School", has an unusual storyline and the player has to find a task to reveal what happens next in the storyline.

Player is FPS character equipped with a gun weapon to destroy a swarm of viruses. User controls the player with the movement button WASD and mouse click to shoot. To complete the inner task, the player needs to complete an objective at a school that is attacked every 20 seconds by mobs.

It is game over immediately if the player surfaces infected (Instant Kill). Games will Ends if the player completes the objective without being infected

The game is still being updated with a re-released version...
